transport.question: I have wheels, but I'm not a car. I have pedals, but I'm not a piano. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You use your legs to move me.
🧑‍⚕️ I can help you stay healthy.
🛣️ You can ride me on a path.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and I carry many people. I stop at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 You can wait for me at a platform.
📍 I can take you to a different city.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky, but I'm not a bird. I take people to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🛄 You need a ticket to ride me.
✈️ I have wings, but they don't flap.

transport.question: I travel on water, but I'm not a fish. I can carry cars across a river. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I carry goods, but I'm not a shopping bag. I have a large container on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 You can see me on the highway.

transport.question: I'm an emergency vehicle, and I use a siren. I help people who are sick or hurt. What am I?
I travel under the sea, but I'm not a fish. I can explore the ocean depths. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I have portholes to see out of.

transport.question: I have two wheels and an engine, but I'm not a car. I am faster than a bicycle. What am I?

hints.text: 🪖 You wear a helmet to ride me.

transport.question: I can take you into space, but I'm not an airplane. I need a lot of fuel to launch. What am I?
I have sails, but I don't have an engine. I use the wind to move across the water. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ I am powered by the wind.
🌊 I am used for recreation or racing.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I am often found in a circus.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I quack and waddle, and I love to swim in ponds. What am I?
I have a long neck and spots all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 📸 You might see me at a zoo.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?
I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I can hide in my shell.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have scales and slither on the ground. Some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I live in many different habitats.

animal.question: I have a pouch for my babies and hop around Australia. What am I?
I am a large marine mammal with blubber to keep me warm. I have a blowhole on top of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am not a fish, I am a mammal.
🌬️ I use my blowhole to breathe.
